Package com.dougnoel.sentinel.configurations

Class ConfigurationManager

java.lang.Object
com.dougnoel.sentinel.configurations.ConfigurationManager
public class ConfigurationManager
extends java.lang.Object
Manages configuration actions, changes, and interaction with PageObject including functionality to get default timeout, default time units, environment data, config path and package lists from PageObject, current URL or URL from a given pageName, user name or password from given account, env, or page, loads pageData for a given pageName, authentication with SSL, searching directories, and class getter and setter method.

    • getOrCreateConfigurationData

      private static java.lang.String getOrCreateConfigurationData​(java.lang.String configurationKey)
      Returns the configuration value for the given configuration property and the given environment from the ConfigurationData class.
      Parameters:
      configurationKey - String the key for the requested configuration property
      Returns:
      String the configuration value

    • getOptionalProperty

      public static java.lang.String getOptionalProperty​(java.lang.String property)
      Returns the configuration property for the given key from the helper function which interfaces with the ConfigurationData object if it exists. If it does not exist, it is created by the helper function. If the value is not found anywhere, the ConfigurationNotFound error is suppressed and a null is returned instead of halting the progress of the program. If the configuration file is not found, we likewise suppress the FileNotFoundException and return null.
      Parameters:
      property - String the requested configuration property key
      Returns:
      String the requested configuration property key or null if nothing is found

    • getProperty

      public static java.lang.String getProperty​(java.lang.String property)
      Returns the configuration property for the given key from the helper function which interfaces with the ConfigurationData object if it exists. If it does not exist, it is created by the helper function.
      Parameters:
      property - String the requested configuration property key
      Returns:
      String the configuration property value
      See Also:
      getOrCreateConfigurationData(String)

    • getEnvironment

      public static java.lang.String getEnvironment()
      Returns the system environment, returns an exception if no env if found, forcing the user to set the env.
      Returns:
      String text of system env info

    • getPageObjectConfigPath

      public static java.io.File getPageObjectConfigPath​(java.lang.String pageName)
      Returns the YAML config file path in the project for a given page object.
      Parameters:
      pageName - String the name of the page object
      Returns:
      File the OS path to the config file

    • searchDirectory

      public static java.io.File searchDirectory​(java.io.File directory, java.lang.String fileName)
      Returns a File handler to a file if it is found in the given directory or any sub-directories.
      Parameters:
      directory - File the directory to start the search
      fileName - String the full name of the file with extension to find
      Returns:
      File the file that is found, null if nothing is found

    • loadPageData

      private static PageData loadPageData​(java.lang.String pageName)
      Returns page data through yaml instructions to a config path in given pageName string.
      Parameters:
      pageName - String the name of the page for which the data is retrieved
      Returns:
      PageData the class for the data on desired page
      Throws:
      ConfigurationNotFoundException - if a configuration option cannot be loaded
      PageObjectNotFoundException - if the page object file could not be read
      See Also:
      getPageObjectConfigPath(String)

    • getUrl

      public static java.lang.String getUrl()
      Returns the URL for the currently active page based on the environment value set.
      Returns:
      String the desired URL
      Throws:
      PageNotFoundException - if page is not found
      URLNotFoundException - if url is not found for the page
      See Also:
      PageManager.getPage(), Page.getName()

    • getUrl

      public static java.lang.String getUrl​(java.lang.String pageName)
      Returns a URL for the given page name based on the environment value set.
      Parameters:
      pageName - String the name of the page from which the url is retrieved
      Returns:
      String baseUrl the url for the given page and current environment

    • getAccountInformation

      public static java.lang.String getAccountInformation​(java.lang.String account, java.lang.String key)
      Returns username or password. Parent Method. Creates pageData object and gets user name or password from its account and env. Logs the key from account info. and logs data var before returning.
      Parameters:
      account - String user account
      key - String username or password
      Returns:
      String requested username or password

    • setValue

      public static void setValue​(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Stores values in a property object for quick and dirty dependency injection. Replaces space chars with '_' char, makes key all lowercase, and logs action.
      Parameters:
      key - String the key to set
      value - String the value to set

    • getValue

      Parameters:
      key - String the item to get
      Returns:
      String the value for the given key

    • detectOperatingSystem

      private static java.lang.String detectOperatingSystem()
      Returns the simple operating system of windows, mac or linux. Returns the full os name if none of those are matched.
      Returns:
      String operating system
